DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Cytogenetic Analysis Chimerism Outcome Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The value in percentage estimating the portion of chimeric cells present in a donor sample.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Cytogenetic Analysis Chimerism Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a laboratory procedure that involves chimerism (the occurrence in an individual of two or more cell populations of different chromosomal constitutions, derived from different individuals) using techniques for analysis of chromosomal and subchromosomal properties and structures, such as those to diagnose, classify, screen for, or manage genetic diseases and abnormalities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: Techniques for analysis of chromosomal and subchromosomal properties and structures, such as those to diagnose, classify, screen for, or manage genetic diseases and abnormalities.:The occurrence in an individual of two or more cell populations of different chromosomal constitutions, derived from different individuals. This contrasts with mosaicism in which the different cell populations are derived from a single individual.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: Techniques for analysis of chromosomal and subchromosomal properties and structures, such as those to diagnose, classify, screen for, or manage genetic diseases and abnormalities.

The occurrence in an individual of two or more cell populations of different chromosomal constitutions, derived from different individuals. This contrasts with mosaicism in which the different cell populations are derived from a single individual.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator. A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
